About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

I am Laleh Walizadeh, a computer science student with a great interest in coding and technology. I started studying website design a year ago, and this field is very interesting to me. Entering university in 2022 has strengthened my interest and made me more prepared to work in the field of information technology. Having a limited but useful experience in the field of website design, I wish to work on real and useful projects in the future and gain new experiences. As I am interested in learning and staying up-to-date in the field of technology, I am always looking for new opportunities to advance and improve my career. As a computer science student, with high motivation and perseverance, I am ready to advance in my academic and professional path and be recognized as a successful professional in the field of technology. I am still looking for suitable job opportunities to apply my knowledge and skills and I will be happy if I get an opportunity to work in the field of technology and website design. I really like to make the world a better place by using the technology and skills available in this area.
